TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit CollectionView extends System.Windows.Threading.DispatcherObject implements class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.Specialized.INotifyCollectionChanged, class System.ComponentModel.ICollectionView, class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged
Public Class CollectionView Inherits DispatcherObject Implements ICollectionView, IEnumerable, INotifyCollectionChanged, INotifyPropertyChanged

public ref class CollectionView : System::Windows::Threading::DispatcherObject, System::Collections::IEnumerable, System::Collections::Specialized::INotifyCollectionChanged, System::ComponentModel::ICollectionView, System::ComponentModel::INotifyPropertyChanged
type CollectionView = class inherit DispatcherObject interface ICollectionView interface IEnumerable interface INotifyCollectionChanged interface INotifyPropertyChanged

summary.span: 表示用于分组、排序、筛选和导航数据集合的视图。

span.span: Represents a view for grouping, sorting, filtering, and navigating a data collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不应在代码中创建此类的对象。You should not create objects of this class in your code. 若要创建一个集合，其中仅实现一个集合视图，创建对象，将添加到集合属性，然后获取集合视图从属性。To create a collection view for a collection that only implements , create a object, add your collection to the property, and get the collection view from the property. 您可以作为绑定源集合，可用于导航和显示基于排序、 筛选和分组查询，而无需操作基础源集合本身的所有集合之上的一个层将集合视图。You can think of a collection view as a layer on top of a binding source collection that allows you to navigate and display the collection based on sort, filter, and group queries, all without having to manipulate the underlying source collection itself. 如果源集合实现接口引发更改事件传播到视图。If the source collection implements the interface, the changes that raise the event are propagated to the views. 因为视图不会更改基础源集合，一个源集合可以具有多个与之关联的视图。Because a view does not change the underlying source collection, a source collection can have multiple views associated with it. 通过使用视图，可以以不同方式显示相同的数据。By using views, you can display the same data in different ways. 例如，您可以使用一系列上的两个视图`Task`对象以显示任务按上一部分的页面优先级排序，并按另一个部分页面的区域分组。For example, you can use two views on a collection of `Task` objects to show tasks sorted by priority on one part of the page and grouped by area on another part of the page. 在[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]应用程序，所有集合都具有关联的默认集合视图。In [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] applications, all collections have an associated default collection view. 而不是直接使用的集合，绑定引擎始终通过关联的视图来访问集合。Rather than working with the collection directly, the binding engine always accesses the collection through the associated view. 若要获取的默认视图，请使用方法。To get the default view, use the method. 内部类基于是仅为实现的集合的默认视图。An internal class based on is the default view for collections that implement only . 是实现的集合的默认视图。 is the default view for collections that implement . 是实现的集合的默认视图或。 is the default view for collections that implement or . 或者，可以创建你的集合中的视图[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]通过使用类，然后将控件绑定到该视图。Alternatively, you can create a view of your collection in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] by using the class and then bind your control to that view. 类是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]的表示形式类。The class is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] representation of the class. 有关示例，请参阅[如何： 进行排序和组数据使用 XAML 中的视图](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml.md)。For an example, see [How to: Sort and Group Data Using a View in XAML](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-sort-and-group-data-using-a-view-in-xaml.md). 详细信息，请参阅"绑定到集合"中[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information, see "Binding to Collections" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 若要在中设置视图[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]，使用类。To set a view in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], use the class. 是[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]表示形式类，并公开最常使用的成员类。 is the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] representation of the class, and it exposes the most commonly used members of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果设置筛选器，此属性的值仅包括传递的筛选器的项。If a filter is set, this property value only includes items that pass the filter. 如果基础集合的类型，这是 o （n） 操作。If the underlying collection is of type , this is an O(N) operation. 此值的集合更改之前缓存。This value is cached until the collection changes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Overridable ReadOnly Property CurrentItem As Object
public: virtual property System::Object ^ CurrentItem { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取视图中的当前项。

span.span: Gets the current item in the view.

value.span: 视图中的当前项。

span.span: The current item of the view.

value.span: 默认情况下，最开始时集合的第一项为当前项。

span.span: By default, the first item of the collection starts as the current item.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合视图支持的当前记录指针的概念。Collection views support the concept of a current record pointer. 浏览集合视图中的对象，您在移动记录指针，您可以检索存在于集合中的特定位置的对象。As you navigate through the objects in a collection view, you are moving a record pointer that allows you to retrieve the object that exists at that particular location in the collection. 请注意，移动的当前记录指针包含与任何排序或筛选的一些交互操作应用于集合。Note that moving the current record pointer has some interactions with any sorting or filtering that is applied to the collection. 排序保留当前记录指针上的最后一个记录选择，但集合视图重构其周围。Sorting preserves the current record pointer on the last record selected, but the collection view is restructured around it. （或许所选的记录曾位于之前，列表的开头，但现在所选的记录可能在中间的某个位置。）如果所选内容保留在视图中的筛选后，筛选操作会保留所选的记录。(Perhaps the selected record was at the beginning of the list before, but now the selected record might be somewhere in the middle.) Filtering preserves the selected record if that selection remains in view after the filtering. 否则，将当前记录指针设置为已筛选的集合视图的第一个记录。Otherwise, the current record pointer is set to the first record of the filtered collection view. 当前项的集合绑定到自动如果绑定的目标是单一实例值。The current item of the collection is bound to automatically if the target of a binding is a singleton value. 如果目标是，与所选的项同步的当前项。If the target is an , the current item is synchronized with the selected item. 例如，如果一个列表框绑定到一个集合，与当前所选的项保持同步。For example, if a list box is bound to a collection, the is synchronized with the currently selected item.

span.para: 传递当前项的处理对另一个内部调用的类对象应重写此属性; 所有其他派生的类应使用方法来更新存储在基类中的当前值。

Only classes that pass currency handling calls to another internal object should override this property; all other derived classes should use the method to update the current values stored in the base class.

Public Overridable Function DeferRefresh () As IDisposable
abstract member DeferRefresh : unit -> IDisposable override this.DeferRefresh : unit -> IDisposable

summary.span: 进入延迟循环，该循环可用于将更改合并到视图并延迟自动刷新。

span.span: Enters a defer cycle that you can use to merge changes to the view and delay automatic refresh.

returns.span: 一个可用于释放调用对象的 对象。

span.span: An object that you can use to dispose of the calling object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 典型的用法是创建`using`使用此方法作用域，然后将多个视图更改调用放在范围内。The typical usage is to create a `using` scope with this method and then place multiple view-changing calls within the scope. 这会延迟自动刷新，直到退出延迟循环。This delays automatic refresh until the defer cycle is exited.

span.span: The item to locate.

summary.span: 返回指定项所在的索引位置。

span.span: Returns the index at which the specified item is located.

returns.span: 指定项所在的索引位置，或 -1（如果该项未知）。

span.span: The index at which the specified item is located, or –1 if the item is unknown.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此方法返回-1 之外的索引，它必须始终为 true，该视图 [索引-1] < 项 < = 的视图 [index]，其中执行比较使用视图，如果存在的方法。If this method returns an index other than -1, it must always be true that view[index-1] < item <= view[index], where the comparisons are done using the method of the view, if one exists. 此特定行为的方法使用一些事件处理程序来提高对插入和删除反应速度。This particular behavior of the method is used by some event handlers to speed up reaction to insertion and deletion. 如果派生的类不重写此方法，侦听器将执行二进制搜索使用方法。If the derived class does not override this method, a listener does a binary search using the method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果找不到指定的项，该方法返回`false`和放在视图中的在集合开头之前。If the specified item is not found, the method returns `false` and the is positioned before the beginning of the collection in the view. 集合视图支持的当前记录指针的概念。Collection views support the concept of a current record pointer. 浏览集合视图中的对象，您在移动记录指针，您可以检索存在于集合中的特定位置的对象。As you navigate through the objects in a collection view, you are moving a record pointer that allows you to retrieve the object that exists at that particular location in the collection. 详细信息，请参阅"绑定到集合"中[数据绑定概述](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md)。For more information, see "Binding to Collections" in [Data Binding Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-binding-overview.md). 有关视图的当前项的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about the current item of a view, see . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用此方法。The following example demonstrates the use of this method. [!code-csharp[Colors#NewColor](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Colors/CSharp/Colors.xaml.cs#newcolor)] [!code-vb[Colors#NewColor](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/Colors/visualbasic/colors.xaml.vb#newcolor)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性指示是否在视图的内部状态发生更改，并需要方法调用。This property indicates if the internal state of the view has changed and requires a method call. 典型情况是如果或类似项已添加到视图的视图是在延迟的刷新周期时 (请参阅)。The typical scenario is if a or similar has been added to the view while the view is in a deferred refresh cycle (see ). 在此方案中，没有显式调用需要; 只要延迟的刷新周期结束，该视图将自动调用刷新。In this scenario, no explicit call to is needed; as soon as the deferred refresh cycle ends, the view calls refresh automatically.
